fullText:
OpenAI重磅发布o3与o4-mini，开启AI“看图思考”新时代
 
北京时间4月16日，OpenAI再次引爆科技圈，正式发布了两款全新的人工智能推理模型——o3和o4-mini，首次让AI具备了“看图思考”的能力，进一步模糊了人类与AI之间的界限。

全新突破：“用眼睛”思考问题的AI https://t.co/2Zeslf4NYi

fullText:
Some thoughts on o3/o4-mini:

o3 is an excellent model. I’ve mostly used it for simple tasks, so my opinion relies on benchmarks, secondhand reports, and its clear qualitative leaps in reasoning, multimodality, and tool use.

It’s not much better than Gemini 2.5 Pro in raw
